name: Cloak of everlasting darkness
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity a good amount.
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It has excellent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'spot weakness'.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
